abstract: Some readers argued that Carl C. Icahn wasn’t practicing what he preached when he took on Yahoo. They have a point.
snippet: Some readers argued that Carl C. Icahn wasn’t practicing what he preached when he took on Yahoo. They have a point.
lead_paragraph: “The real trouble with this country is that we can’t compete because by and large we have terrible boards of directors. I know because I’m on seven of them. They are dysfunctional for the most part. They should have accountability.”

headline.main: The Kettle? The Pot Says He’s Black
headline.print_headline: The Kettle? The Pot Says He’s Black
